message.content: Buatkan saya website untuk usaha donat, dimana pada Home, ada hero untuk menyimpan video. Kemudian ada Story dimana isinya profile toko donat, kemudian Menu, selanjutnya ada promo, dan terakhir kontak. Nama usahanya adalah DoughHeaven.

DoughHeaven is a donut shop website featuring handcrafted donuts and sweet delights. The site includes sections for their story, menu offerings like Classic Glazed and Chocolate Heaven donuts, special promotions, and contact information. Founded in 2020, they specialize in using premium ingredients and traditional baking techniques. The website has a modern design with a video hero section, responsive navigation, and an online contact form.
Buatkan home, story, menu, promo, dan kontak berbeda halaman, tapi terintegrasi satu sama lain menggunakan navbar yang di atas

Transformed the website into a multi-page structure with separate pages for home, story, menu, promos, and contact sections while maintaining an integrated navigation system. The navbar now links to individual HTML pages instead of scrolling within a single page, creating a more organized user experience while preserving the cohesive brand identity.
message.description: Updated navigation to use separate pages instead of scroll sections

message.content: Reverted to a past version
buatkan halaman home-nya berisi hero, kemudian menu favorite, our story, promo, testimoni, kemudian footer

Enhanced the home page with a comprehensive layout featuring a captivating hero section, curated favorite menu items, compelling story highlights, current promotions, customer testimonials, and a professional footer. The redesigned structure creates a complete user journey that showcases DoughHeaven's offerings while encouraging visitors to explore more.
message.description: Enhanced home page with favorite menu, story, promos, testimonials and footer

message.content:
tolong yang promo ubah menjadi seperti ini dan dibawahnya tambahkan Ambiance ```html

Current Promotions

{{ promo.title }}

{{ promo.description }}

Valid until: {{ promo.validUntil }}

Restaurant Ambiance

```

Updated the promotions section with a vibrant red background and added a new ambiance section showcasing the restaurant's atmosphere. The promotions now feature a cleaner card-based layout with hover effects, while the ambiance section displays a beautiful grid of images that expand on hover, giving visitors a visual taste of the DoughHeaven experience.
message.description: Updated promo section and added ambiance section

message.content: Apakah bisa pada  hero section menjadi slide show yang dipinggirnya ada navigasinya

Enhanced the hero section with an elegant slideshow featuring navigation arrows on both sides. The slideshow now cycles through captivating images that showcase DoughHeaven's delicious offerings, creating a more dynamic and engaging first impression for visitors.
message.description: Updated hero section with slideshow and navigation

lalu ubah colornya\

Updated the website's color scheme with a soft pastel palette featuring a delicate cream background, pink accents, and rich brown text. The new colors create a warm, inviting atmosphere that perfectly complements the donut shop theme while maintaining excellent readability and visual hierarchy throughout the navigation and favorites sections.
message.description: Updated color scheme for navbar and favorites section

message.content: Reverted to a past version
Reverted to a past version

Kemudian buatkan halaman story.html yang isinya\
\
hero dengan gambar dan tulisan "Welcome to DoughHaeven

**Where every bite feels like heaven."**

Created a captivating story page with an elegant hero section featuring a beautiful bakery image and the welcoming tagline "Where every bite feels like heaven." The page establishes DoughHeaven's brand identity with a warm, inviting design that draws visitors into their sweet journey.
posisi gambar dibawah foto yang ada orangnya

I need more information about what you're asking for. Could you please clarify which image you'd like to position below "the photo with people in it"? Are you referring to a specific image on the story.html page, or would you like me to add a new image below an existing one?

Hapus satu foto yang ada di Our Sweet Journey, kemudian samakan style dan posisi setiap heading text seperti our sweet Journey, Our Philosophy. Dan Looking Forward ubah menjadi Meet the Dough Dream Team

Behind every glazed ring is a passionate team of bakers, dreamers, and donut-lovers who wake up early (really early!) just to make sure your box of joy is fresh and perfect.

Whether itâs your morning pick-me-up or your late-night treat â we got you.

---

### Our Mission

To spread a little sweetness, one donut at a time.\
We hope to grow beyond our little corner, but no matter how far we go, our hearts will always be in the kitchen â baking happiness for you.

---

### Why âDoughHaevenâ?

Itâs simple:\
**Dough** for what we love.\
**Heaven** for how it tastes.\
DoughHaeven is our happy place â and we hope it becomes yours, too.

---

Wanna know a secret?\
The best donut is the one you share.\
So bring a friend. Bring a smile. Bring your appetite.\
Weâll take care of the rest. ð

Enhanced the story page with a cohesive layout featuring consistent heading styles and improved content organization. The "Meet the Dough Dream Team" section now replaces "Looking Forward" with heartfelt content about the passionate team behind DoughHeaven, while the mission statement, brand name explanation, and friendly closing invitation create an engaging narrative that builds emotional connection with visitors.

pada hero section gunakan style sebelumnya, kemudian our Sweet Journey, tambahkan dua foto founder dan dapur produksi, kemudian Our Philosophy juga tambahkan gambar yang Meet the Dough Dream Team, our Mission, Why "DoughHeaven" jadikan tiga Card yang bersebelahan, kemudian bawahnya tambahkan our Team, Our Testimoni, dan terakhir Wanna know a secret?\
The best donut is the one you share.\
So bring a friend. Bring a smile. Bring your appetite.\
We'll take care of the rest. ð

Restructured the story page with a captivating hero section and organized content sections. Added founder and production kitchen photos to "Our Sweet Journey," incorporated team imagery for "Meet the Dough Dream Team," and transformed philosophy sections into three elegant side-by-side cards. New sections for "Our Team" and "Testimonials" enhance the narrative, while the heartfelt closing message creates an inviting conclusion that encourages community and sharing.

Buatkan halaman menu.html, isinya hero section yang sama seperti story, kemudian ada navigasi donat kategori, kemudian daftar menu setiap kategori menggunakan satu menu satu card, isi card-nya ada gambar, nama menu, deskripsi, harga, dan tombol pesan,

Created a delicious menu page with an elegant hero section matching the story page style. The page features intuitive category navigation and beautifully designed cards for each donut variety. Each menu item is showcased with appetizing images, descriptive text, clear pricing, and convenient order buttons that make browsing and selecting treats a delightful experience.

Lalu buatkan halaman Promo yang isinya\
\
**1. Promo Aktif (Current Deals)**

Bagian paling atas menampilkan promo yang sedang berlangsung:

- **âBuy 5 Get 1 Freeâ**

- **â20% Off for Online Orders Every Fridayâ**

- **âDonut & Coffee Combo Only Rp25.000â**

- **âStudent Discount: Show Your ID, Get 10% Offâ**

ð Sertakan tanggal berlaku, syarat & ketentuan singkat.

---

### ð§ **2. Flash Sale / Limited Time Offers**

- Hitung mundur: â³ *âEnds in 2 days!â*

- Cocok untuk stok donat tertentu atau varian musiman.

- Contoh: *âMatcha Madness â 50% Off Until Sunday!â*

---

### ð¦ **3. Bundle Deals & Gift Sets**

- *âShare the Joy: Box of 12 Only Rp89.000â*

- *âPerfect for Gifting: Premium Donut Box + Greeting Cardâ*

Tambahkan tombol **"Order Now"** biar langsung konversi!

---

### ð **4. Loyalty Program / Rewards Info**

Kalau DoughHaeven punya sistem loyalti:

- *âCollect 10 stamps, get 1 donut free!â*

- *âJoin DoughHaeven Club & Earn Points Every Orderâ*

- Bisa juga dihubungkan ke akun member/customer.

---

### ð **5. Birthday Treats**

- *âFree Donut on Your Birthday!â*

- Bisa dengan syarat follow akun sosial media dan tunjukkan ID.

---

### ð£ **6. Promo Kolaborasi / Event**

- Contoh: *âDoughHaeven x KopiKitaâ* â beli donat, dapet diskon kopi.

- Atau event khusus: *âPop-up Store di Mall A â Free Samples All Day!â*

---

### ð **7. Syarat & Ketentuan Umum**

- Satu bagian khusus di bawah (collapse section) untuk syarat promo:

  - Hanya berlaku di outlet tertentu

  - Tidak bisa digabung dengan promo lain

  - Selama persediaan masih ada

Created an enticing promotions page with vibrant sections showcasing current deals, limited-time offers, and special bundles. The page features countdown timers for flash sales, attractive loyalty program information, birthday treats, and collaboration events. Each promotion includes clear validity dates, terms, and eye-catching "Order Now" buttons to drive conversions, all organized in a visually appealing layout that makes special offers easy to browse.
Buatkan halaman Promos.html

Created a vibrant promotions page that showcases all current deals and special offers. The page features eye-catching sections for active promotions, limited-time flash sales, bundle deals, loyalty program benefits, birthday treats, and special collaborations. Each promotion includes clear validity dates and call-to-action buttons to encourage immediate engagement.

Created a comprehensive promotions page with vibrant sections for current deals, flash sales, and special offers. The page features attractive cards for each promotion type, including buy-one-get-one deals, online discounts, combo offers, and loyalty programs. Each section includes clear validity dates, countdown timers for limited offers, and prominent call-to-action buttons to drive customer engagement.

Updated the navigation bar with improved visual indicators for the active page. The desktop navbar now features a pink underline for the current page, while the mobile menu highlights the active page with a subtle pink background, creating a more intuitive user experience across all devices.

buatkan halaman contact.html dengan navbar dan footer yang sama seperti pada halaman index ini

Created a comprehensive contact page with a user-friendly layout featuring a contact form, location map, and business information. The page maintains consistent navigation and footer elements while providing multiple ways for customers to reach DoughHeaven, including a direct message form, physical address, phone number, and email address.
untuk semua halaman, tulisan samakan font-nya

Updated all pages with consistent typography throughout the website. The standardized font styling creates a cohesive visual identity across all sections, improving readability and brand recognition while maintaining the warm, inviting atmosphere that reflects DoughHeaven's personality.
message.description: Updated typography with Poppins font and added active page indicators
